perms.title: perms
perms.info: module to manage bot permissions. Permissions can be managed per user, per role, and then command and module permissions can be set for all users. User permissions take precedence, followed by role permissions, command permissions, and then module permissions.

bothelp.title: bothelp
bothelp.info: help module, currently being used if you are reading this.

rng.title: rng
rng.info: fun module for RNG based commands like tarot and bbq

quotes.title: quotes
quotes.info: module for making and managing "quote" responses that can be triggered by specific phrases

timed_roles.title: timed_roles
timed_roles.info: module for time based moderator commands like roles that expire after a period of time or ratelimiting a user

tr.title: tr
tr.info: assigns a timed role to a user which expires after the given amount of time
tr.example:
`+tr rose @zoefiri 10 minutes`gives user zoefiri the role rose for 10 minutes
`+tr muted @zoefiri 3 h` mutes user zoefiri for 3 hours
tr.usage: `+tr <role name> <user tag> <time amount> <time unit (h,m,s,hours, minutes, seconds, secs, mins, etc.)>`

limit.title: limit
limit.info: ratelimits a given user, so that they may only speak once every time period specified (i.e.) ratelimiting to 5 secs, they may only speak every 5 seconds.
limit.example: `+limit @zoefiri 5` ratelimits user zoefiri to sending messages every 5 seconds

perm_add.title: perm_add
perm_add.info:
adds a new permission to the bot, true by default. may be used to give a user permission or restrict permission to a certain command (putting - at the end of the command sets the permission to false).
**!!!WARNING!!!**
setting a module or command's permission to true will make all users capable of running it unless it is explicitly disabled for them.
perm_add.example:
`+perm_add user @zoefiri rng` allows user zoefiri to use commands in the rng module
`+perm_add user @zoefiri tarot -` disables user zoefiri's ability to use the tarot command
perm_add.usage:
roles (case sensitive): `+perm_add role <role> <module/command>`
users: `+perm_add user <user tag> <module/command>`
command: `+perm_add command <command name>`
module: `+perm_add module <module name>`

ltds.title: ltds
ltds.info: sets the rate at which quotes can be triggered
ltds.example: `+ltds 60` users can only trigger quotes once every minute

trls.title: trls
trls.info: gives a list of timed roles a user is currently assigned

del_quote.title: del_quote
del_quote.example: `+del_quote test` removes the bot's response to "test"

quote.title: quote
quote.example: `+quote test` adds a new quote for the trigger "test"

help.title: help
help.info: help command, you're using it right now.
help.example:
`+help rng` shows help for rng module
`+help tarot` shows help for tarot command

perm_setup.title: perm_setup
perm_setup.info: sets up initial server permissions (this command for owners exclusively)

perm_rm.title: perm_rm
perm_rm.info: deletes a permission from the bot
perm_rm.example: `+perm_rm user @zoefiri rng` removes any special permissions set for user zoefiri on the rng module
perm_rm.usage: `+perm_rm <role/user/module/command> <name for role/user/module/command>` syntax is identical to +perm_add except for the trailing `-`

limitq.title: limitq
limitq.info: send what a user's current ratelimit is
limitq.example: `+limitq @zoefiri` show what zoefiri's current ratelimit is

trm.title: trm
trm.info: remove a timed role from a user
trm.example: `+trm rose @zoefiri` removes the timed role rose from zoefiri

perm_ls.title: perm_ls
perm_ls.example:
`+perm_ls user @zoefiri` show perms set for user zoefiri
`+perm_ls user @zoefiri rng` check zoefiri's perms for module rng
`+perm_ls module` list all module permissions
